channel.title: 508 Construction Zone
channel.description:
So, currently I'm working on a 508 bulby server.
While browsing through google for a long time, I found a tutorial which shows you how to make a base of construction in 508. But, I would need a construction zone for this. It doesn't show in the tutorial how to do this. I mean the construction zone just like in Runescape.
Does anybody know how to do this?

item.title: 508 Construction Zone
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:8, topic:401808”]Hmm… Well actually something like in that video would be awesome… But problem is, is there a place in the 508 map with only flat green ground?

That’s also actually kinda what I asked, how can I make a place like that.[/quote]
it probably is because 317 are adding 508 maps. But the 508 revision should have all the 317 maps.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Construction Zone
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:3, topic:401808”][quote author=halflive9 link=topic=498867.msg3648149#msg3648149 date=1309539589]

So, currently I’m working on a 508 bulby server.

While browsing through google for a long time, I found a tutorial which shows you how to make a base of construction in 508. But, I would need a construction zone for this. It doesn’t show in the tutorial how to do this. I mean the construction zone just like in Runescape.

Does anybody know how to do this?

if i understand it. You mean that you want a special zone to train construction?
[/quote]
No… I mean like something just like construction in runescape, a place with only your house in there, which can’t be accessed by anybody else. And everybody’s got their own plain land to build his house on.[/quote]
Hmm… you should have a lot of map i guess. Then u should make a portal that random teleports you to a location. And then set that location to lock or something, so other players can’t join.

Read full topic
